modName: ukjah PLAYER HOME The Last Nerevarine V3
summary: You Heard distant voices, leading you to a mysterious cave, east of Svendler den, you should go there and discover their origin.
descriptionHtml:
I Made this home in homage of Nerevarine, the hero of Elderscroll III Morrowind. Fully furnished, easy to organize, I hope you will enjoy the atmosphere, watching mammoths running, and the fantastic view from the hot spring. Maybe i will add some content later, like the secret tomb of nerevarine, and a basement, with creatures npc.

 Location  : east of svendler den, west of fort greymoor, well its the big plain west of whiterun, anyway i put a grove markermap you can travel to

- Don't forget to read the book for the small background story.
- All containers set to "non-respawn" but some have items for fun.
- You should, at last, have a minimum of 16 in distance light setting, to fully enjoy distant lights of my cave, and a more brightened enb settings to don't feel alone in the dark.
- Manekins get a random posture when you enter the first time in the cave, so if you don't like it, just reload and come again. Sometimes there is also a strange glitch if you didn't put anything on a manekin and reload the room, his static image could be floating anywhere,
but if you activate the manekin at his initial position, you will be able to store a piece of armor to get him back).

WARNING : if you saved your game with previous versions, or stored some stuff in the cave follow this steps : load game with old esp, take back your stuff, save in ANOTHER INTERIOR cell. Reload game without any esp, save again in the same place. Then reload the game with the new ESP. file... Enjoy !

NEW in 3.0
- Outside : Hot Spring and enter improved with plants and lights, added a secret door to avoid these ugly grass.
- Inside : added some foods and clutters, less powered items and stuff to don't disturb balance of vanilla items.
- Modified the background story by a better one, translated by Tredmillion. Thanks to him.


NEW in 2.0
- External hot spring
- Fixed some lights/bugs.
- Added weapon racks and some clutter
- Renamed some stuff

Let me know if you encouter any bugs or boring glitches.
Thanks to people downloading and rating my work.

ps: screenshots from creation kit sorry for bad quality.
In final release i'll disable fast traveling ability if player never visited the cave.
author: ukjah
